output: html_notebook

```{r}
# import libraries
library("readr")
library("dplyr")
library("lubridate")

# load csv-file with all data
data_net <- read_csv("df_neural_net.csv")

```


```{r}
#creating another variable named season 

data_net <- data_net %>%
  mutate(season = ifelse(month(Datum) %in% c(3, 4, 5), "Spring",
                         ifelse(month(Datum) %in% c(6, 7, 8), "Summer",
                                ifelse(month(Datum) %in% c(9, 10, 11), "Fall", "Winter"))))

# Print the updated dataframe
print(head(data_net))
```

```{r}
# Save the processed data as CSV
write.csv(data_net, file = "df_neural_net_variables.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
